items.title: A technician's take: Berkshire Hathaway is primed for a comeback
items.description: A technician sees a pattern showing Berkshire Hathaway is about to rise.

items.title: Crypto exchange Bullish prices IPO at $37 per share, above expected range, ahead of NYSE debut
items.description: Crypto exchange Bullish priced its IPO at $37 per share, above its expected range, giving it a market value of more than $5 billion.
